direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods configure a Safelist with a range of allowed tags and attributes, but 'relaxed' allows more tags and attributes than 'basic'.
Both methods extend the 'basic' Safelist but 'basicWithImages' additionally allows 'img' tags and their attributes.
Both methods configure a Safelist with a range of allowed tags, but 'simpleText' restricts to only simple text formatting tags.
Both methods configure a Safelist, but 'none' allows only text nodes, while 'relaxed' allows a full range of text and structural body HTML.
The 'relaxed' method internally calls 'addTags' to configure the allowed tags, making it a direct dependency.
The 'relaxed' method internally calls 'addAttributes' to configure the allowed attributes for specific tags, making it a direct dependency.
The 'relaxed' method internally calls 'addProtocols' to configure the allowed URL protocols for specific attributes, making it a direct dependency.
